long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
App skips Ads automatically. Automatically skips ads in 5 seconds, Hides Ad Banner. Locks Pre-roll.
Say goodbye to annoying ads and distractions with our powerful ad blocker. Enjoy a faster, clutter-free browsing experience.

Removes ads from Youtubeâ„¢
* Ads Block on YouTube or Video Website  *

+ Block the most annoying ads, including: autoplay video ads, youtube ads, expanding ads, interstitial page ads, overlay ads.
 
Pro Adblock is an adblocker for youtube made for Chrome browser  to block all ads that are appearing on start  when watching tube videos.
provides an uninterrupted and smooth web surfing experience with a robust ad-blocking engine that blocks all disrupting ads. Enjoy watching videos, connecting with friends through social media, and checking out your favorite news website without being interrupted by unskippable video promotions, pop-ups, and other distracting ads. 

Without the extension:
Before or during the playback of the youtube video, video ads can be shown.
